ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisReappointment of MICHAEL BINDER of Orleans, Ontario, as a permanent member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of MICHAEL BINDER as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission.
